name: GetLegacyFileVersionLegalHolds
description:
Retrieve file versions on legal hold in the legacy system.

This endpoint fetches file versions under legal hold in the legacy architecture for a specific legal hold assignment. It may not return all file versions for the policy ID. For file versions held in the new architecture, refer to the appropriate newer endpoints. This API will be deprecated after re-architecture completion.

parameters.name: legal_hold_policy_id
parameters.description: The ID of the legal hold policy for which file version legal holds need to be retrieved.

value_schema.description:
The ID of the legal hold policy to get the file version legal
holds for.

parameters.name: pagination_marker
parameters.description: A string that defines the starting point for marker-based pagination. Requires `usemarker` to be true.

value_schema.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

This requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

parameters.name: max_items_per_page
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of items to return per page for the request.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the box API.

parameters.name: policy_id
parameters.description:
The ID of the legal hold policy to get the file version legal
holds for.

value_schema.description:
The ID of the legal hold policy to get the file version legal
holds for.

parameters.name: marker
parameters.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

This requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

value_schema.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

This requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
